items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yesss to this Dress! ðŸ˜
items.body: Had to get a last minute dress for a friendâ€™s wedding and Amazon came through hunny!!! The dress is long! I had on probably a 4 inch heel and still had to hold the dress up to walk. Iâ€™m short (4â€11) so the split was at a good spot. Dress was comfortable and it was nice style for the occasion. I ordered a large and it was very form fitting. My husband loved it also and actually helped me decide on this versus two others I had. Good quality and price. Please note, the dress is an emerald green but appears a differs color under certain shades of light (just in case you trying to match for pictures.) Read more
items.author: Christal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: Ordered in my usual sizing. But the neckline was almost loose. I was afraid I would have to use body tape to keep the sleeeves in place. Orders a size down (L) and it fits great! The fabric is light and has a lot of give. Once you place the crossing patterns along the bust in place it looks amazing. The shape and cut are perfect and it will still be long even with heels. The zipper is really nice and smooth as well. Would highly recommend Read more
items.author: Kaci Christison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: Tall girl friendly, stretchy material that feels nice. Sleeves are a great length. Overall I love this dress. Decent zipper, breathable fabric. I am 6' 190lbs Read more
items.author: Shannon Withrow

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars 5'3 180 pounds xL Black dress
items.body: My daughter wore this beautiful dress to her winter formal dance. She looked stunning. She got so many compliments. The fabric was thin and stretchy. but because it was black it wasn't see through. She wanted a train which it had. It's pretty long but she wanted it that way. The slit is on the side but that didn't bother her. She did wear pretty high stoledos with it. And it was still long. She had to kind of hold her dress when walking. It was perfect form fitting. I would say true to size. If you went a size down for her I think it would be too tight. She's 5'3 and about 180 pounds. For the most part her arm sleeves stayed in place. she said when dancing she had to pick them up a couple times but nothing, to wear she was annoyed. Good product for the price. I gave it a 4 only because she had to pick up the arm sleeves at times but I'd recommend this dress. Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
items.body: Literally just got it a few minutes ago and it smells like perfume and cigarettes . Also threads are loose everywhere and looks like there is a stain not worth the price could have gotten something better on SHEIN Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Emerald green gown fitted
items.body: I purchased this dress as a backup for an event, so the pictures are of me, trying it on with great undergarments. The dress is beautiful with a lot of stretch. It is long even with hills, but manageable. The bosom is on display, but very tasteful and covered. The dress has so much stretch that The zipper wasnâ€™t necessary. The material is lightweight and thin, but not cheap and quality. I wouldâ€™ve worn this to performing. It definitely will show all of your curves and good undergarments are a must. The split is pretty high, but still tasteful. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Pretty!
items.body: Beautiful dress! I wore it to a Shrine Gala. I am very short, 5â€™3â€ and it is too long. I just held it up as I walked and it wasnâ€™t too much trouble. I did sew the slit so that it wasnâ€™t so high as I felt uncomfortable with it being above my knee. It is VERY clingy but I think it â€œclingsâ€ in the right places. :) I am a size large and ordered a large. Be careful with the jewelry you choose as it does snag very easily. Read more
items.author: Valori Engstrom

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve Evening Cocktail High Split Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve Evening Cocktail High Split Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floor Black, Floor Red, Floor Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
